name: Emirates NEW First Class Suite - Boeing 777
description:
Emirates recently announced a game-changing new FIRST CLASS cabin in their 777's. The fully-enclosed suites are all the rage! And with good reason, but this video gives you the chance to judge for yourself.

We'll experience Emirates' new first class cabin with its customizable lighting, adjustable temperature, video room service, intense privacy, and so much more!

I was so excited to have the opportunity to check-out Emirates' new, fully-enclosed 777 First Class Suite that I didn't sleep the night before my flight. Even though I was tired, I had no problem enjoying every single moment of the flight from Dubai to Brussels. 

There's great food, awesome amenities, incredible views, and a TRAMPOLINE! No, really...watch and you'll see!

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
http://jebbrooksflies.com

Check me out on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooks/

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog:
https://greenergrass.com/

Music: 
Today Is A Good Day To Live - Martin Carlberg
Say That You Won't Go - Loving Caliber
ES_The Paper Birch - Johannes Bornlöf
Children Of Summer (Instrumental Version) - David Björk
